entry.title: DW 6300 Flat Base snare stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: DW
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 129.99

DW 6300 flat base snare stand brand new. Old-School Flat Base Design
Very Lightweight (5.8 Lbs.)
Recessed Locking Snare Basket
Min. Height: 19.5"
Max. Height: 27.5"
ITEM DETAILS
The DW DWCP6300 Flush Base Snare Drum Stand features an old-school flat base design and minimal weight (5.8 lbs.), making it an excellent piece of gear to haul around from gig to gig if you want to keep your hardware case light. A recessed locking screw keeps the basket locked into position no matter how heavy your drum.

Type: Sets & Kits

PDP New Yorker Electric green sparkle 4pc drum set. Brand new.
Created in the storied DW Custom Shop, this PDP New Yorker 4-piece drum kit is built in compact sizes for easy portability. It features a 10x8‚Äù mounted tom, 13x12‚Äù floor tom, 16x14‚Äù bass drum and a matching 14x5‚Äù snare. The shells are made from poplar wood for a full, warm tone despite the small size. The turret lugs are low-mass, helping to maximize resonance and minimize weight. These stylish kits are perfect for students and working drummers who need to save on space.

This shell pack also includes a bass drum lifter for easy positioning of the 16‚Äù kick to accommodate any standard pedal. All of the drums are fitted with genuine Remo heads, made specifically for PDP and DW.

Perfect for players who live and gig in cramped city spaces

Created at the DW Custom Shop in California

entry.title: Pearl Session Studio Select 5pc Gloss Barnwood Brown
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pearl
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 1869.00

$1869.00 Pearl Session Studio Select Gloss Barnwood brown. Brand new. Gorgeous kit!! Ready to deliver pure Pearl sound in the studio with the perfect blend of birch and mahogany.


All-New Session Studio Select featuring a Free 14" Floor Tom (A $349.00 Value)


For over a quarter century, Pearl's Session Series has yielded some of the most harmonically vibrant recorded drum tones ever captured in the studio environment. Returning with a custom upgrade from our Masterworks spectrum, new Session Studio Select drums shift to a thin, 5.4 mm EvenPly-Six combination of Masters-grade birch and African mahogany.

The result is a blend of pre-EQ'd clarity and warmth with the added controlled punch of Pearl's fresh 60-degree bearing edge. In addition to a host of finish and hardware upgrades, Session Studio Select drums carry on Pearl's tradition of value for the pro player; with three specially-priced shell sets, each including a FREE added floor tom.

Complementing your evolving playing style with a sophisticated tonal feel and look, Session Studio Select's premium features are outmatched only by its price. Snare, cymbals and hardware sold separately.

MPN: STS925XSP/C314
FEATURES

22x16" bass drum, 10x7 and 12x8" toms, and 14x14 and 16x16" floor toms
6-ply 5.4 mm birch/African mahogany shells
60¬∫ bearing edge
2.3 mm triple-flanged SuperHoop II hoops and OptiMount Suspension System
Snare, cymbals and hardware sold separately

entry.title: Pearl Compact Traveler 2pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pearl
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 313.00

Pearl Compact traveler 2pc drum set. Big sound in a small super portable package. Using tunable 18" and 10" snare drum frames to pitch each drum head into a playable drum set platform, the Compact Traveler's interconnecting system allows real tone in a tight setting that folds up flat for easy storage. Compact Traveler is ideal for schools, street drumming, and gigs on even the smallest stages.

Note: Cymbals, hi-hat pedal, bass drum pedal and cymbal stand sold separately.

Features

10" snare and 18" bass drum frames use standard drum heads for full-sounding drum set play
Quick, compact setup in any situation
Drum key tunable
Folds up flat for easy storage or transport
Includes 3/8" rod for stacking percussion instruments

Tama Superstar Classic 3pc Red Sparkle drum set.¬†
22x18,16x14,12x9

Used some minor wear mainly on the bass drum. ¬†Some tape residue and some blemishes on bass drum hoops. ¬†Minor blemishes in the wrap and some age on the chrome.¬†


For nearly forty years the Superstar name has stood for groundbreaking design, ¬≠superior build quality, sterling tone, and clear projection. Now Tama introduces this ¬≠legendary kit in its most sonically aggressive persona yet¬¶featuring 100% maple ¬≠shells. Thinner and livelier than ever, the Tama designers have dialed in the perfect ¬≠combination of sensitivity and high-end "cut."

Drawing on Superstar of the past, its classic Tama T-shape badge and streamlined ¬≠low-mass single lugs point to the simpler state of art of the 70's, while the ingenious ¬≠Star-Mount system maximizes resonance and eclipses everything in its class-all at a surprisingly affordable price.

entry.title: Ludwig NueSonic Digital Black Oyster 3pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 1299.99

$1299.99 Ludwig Digital Black Oyster NueSonic 3pc Drum Set! 22,16,13. ¬†Snare stand not included. Beautiful set and deep sound! ¬†

Elevating their sonic palette, Ludwig is proud to introduce a new line of USA drums crafted for the working professional! NeuSonic series drums by Ludwig offers yet another tonally rich option for the drummer looking for reliability and performance for every working professional setting.

They feature a cross-over shell design blending a 3-ply maple exterior with a 3-ply cherry interior. With five exciting finishes, NeuSonic captures the traditional Ludwig aesthetics coupled with a brand new sound that will compliment a wide-range of performance settings. The industry's best-in-class for price of any USA made drum set.
A 6-ply crossover shell made up of a 3-ply maple exterior and 3-ply cherry interior. Formed at Ludwig's factory in Monroe, NC USA, this shell measures at 5 mm thick for optimal resonance and sustain.
Neusonic series shells features a single 45-degree bearing edge with a 1/16" back cut. This offers wide-range tuning abilities and optimal sustain.
To increase stability throughout the drum, all Ludwig USA shells are produced using Radio Frequency Technology. Using a process involving their original bladder molds from the 1960's, R.F.S.T's unique bonding system combined with a specialized adhesive cures each shell evenly over the entire surface of the shell. This process is truly the principal iningredient to the "Ludwig Sound".
Component Features:
Bass Drum: Virgin Kick Drum, Mini-Elite Lugs, Low Mass Claw Hooks, NeuSonic Straight Spurs
Floor Tom: Triad Leg Brackets w/ Floor Tom Legs, Mini-Elite Lugs
Tom: Triad Tom Bracket, Mini-Elite Lugs w/ (1) PM0048 Tom Holder
Shell Dimensions:
Bass: 14 x 22"
Floor: 16 x 16"
Tom: 9 x 13"
